trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around December 4th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMe an my friend where driving home when suddenly few miles away a big green flash appeared and then the colored aura kind of dissappeared. We both thought it was supernatural. So it pretty much dimmed down after a sudden green flash, there was no sound or anything, we went looking for it, checked few roades around the area between Columbia River and Vancouver Lake but didn't find anything. When we where heading home after the search on our way back we saw a strange man, in the middle of nowhere; when it was dark and raining, and he had a little cart that he was pulling and walking on the side of the road, so we though that was a little strange. Also when we where in the middle of our search aproximitley 5-10 minutes after sighting we heard a strange creature like sound in our car.
Summary: Sudden green light flash and then "heat down" and dissapearence few miles away.
